Title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
FullTitle: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
Plot: Indiana Jones teams up with a nightclub singer named Wilhelmina "Willie" Scott and a twelve-year-old Chinese boy named Short Round. They end up in a small distressed village in India, where the people believe that evil spirits have taken all their children away after a sacred precious stone was stolen. They also discover the great mysterious terror surrounding a booby-trapped temple known as the Temple of Doom. Thuggee is beginning to attempt to rise once more, believing that with the power of all five Sankara stones they can rule the world. It's all up to Indiana to put an end to the Thuggee campaign, rescue the lost children, win the girl and conquer the Temple of Doom.
Writers: Willard Huyck, Gloria Katz, George Lucas
Stars: Harrison Ford, Kate Capshaw, Ke Huy Quan, Amrish Puri
Tagline: The man in the hat is back...
Keywords: india,boy elephant relationship,screaming woman,woman screaming,lifting a male into the air

Similars.Title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
Similars.FullTitle: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
Similars.Plot: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.
Similars.Stars: Harrison Ford, Sean Connery, Alison Doody

Similars.Title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
Similars.FullTitle: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
Similars.Plot: In 1957, archaeologist and adventurer Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. is called back into action and becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.
Similars.Stars: Harrison Ford, Cate Blanchett, Shia LaBeouf

Similars.Title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
Similars.FullTitle: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
Similars.Plot: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.
Similars.Stars: Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman

Similars.Title: Back to the Future Part III
Similars.FullTitle: Back to the Future Part III (1990)
Similars.Plot: Stranded in 1955, Marty McFly learns about the death of Doc Brown in 1885 and must travel back in time to save him. With no fuel readily available for the DeLorean, the two must figure how to escape the Old West before Emmett is murdered.
Similars.Stars: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Mary Steenburgen

Similars.Title: Back to the Future Part II
Similars.FullTitle: Back to the Future Part II (1989)
Similars.Plot: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.
Similars.Stars: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson

Similars.Title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
Similars.Plot: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.
Similars.Stars: Jeff Goldblum, Julianne Moore, Pete Postlethwaite

Similars.Title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
Similars.FullTitle: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
Similars.Plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.
Similars.Stars: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher

Similars.Title: The Terminator
Similars.Plot: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.
Similars.Stars: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn

Similars.Title: Jurassic Park
Similars.Plot: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.
Similars.Stars: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum

Similars.Title: Untitled Indiana Jones Project
Similars.Plot: The plot is unknown at this time.
Similars.Stars: Mads Mikkelsen, Harrison Ford, Phoebe Waller-Bridge

Similars.Title: Jaws
Similars.Plot: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.
Similars.Stars: Roy Scheider, Robert Shaw, Richard Dreyfuss

Similars.Title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
Similars.FullTitle: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens (2015)
Similars.Plot: As a new threat to the galaxy rises, Rey, a desert scavenger, and Finn, an ex-stormtrooper, must join Han Solo and Chewbacca to search for the one hope of restoring peace.
Similars.Stars: Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Oscar Isaac
